## IsAny type

If T is any, return true, else return false.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type IsAny<T> = IsExtends<number, 0 & T>
```
**References:** [IsExtends](./types-kit.isextends.md)

## Example


```ts
// Expect: true
type Foo = IsAny<any>
```
